show_name: Uchi no Maid ga Uzasugiru!: Uchi no Maid wa Yappari Mou Honto Uzainda naa...
other_title: Uchi no Maid ga Uzasugiru! OVA
UzaMaid! My Maid Is Still Seriously Way Too Annoying...
うちのメイドがウザすぎる！うちのメイドはやっぱりもうホントウザいんだなあ......
opening_theme: "Uza Uza☆Wows! (ウザウザ☆わおーっす！)" by Misha Takanashi (Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
ending_theme: "Tokimeki☆Climax (ときめき☆くらいまっくす)" by Misha Takanashi Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
